description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. With two completely new game modes and new Badges to unlock, Sqong Christmas is the second edition to the Sqong family. Never has catching falling presents or hitting Christmas ornaments been so much fun! Play alone, meet your friends in battle or Join together in co-op mode. Gain as much scores/hits as you possibly can. Global scoreboard will show us who has the true Sqong Christmas Spirit!
